texts.name: Moandor
texts.biography: Moandor's charismatic style somehow stayed with him after he was transformed into a lich.  Strangely enough, this provides him with the ability to lead and recruit new liches more effectively than any other hero.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Liches or Power Liches for each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.name: Liches
